literals: " !yako eb ll'uoy dna ,gniog peeK !sgnittes fo yteirav a ni slliks gnidoc esu osla nac uoY !ti teg ll'uoy ,tsisrep uoy fi tub ,tsrif ta drah mees yam gnidoC"
"!ecitcarp htiw retteb teg ll‘uoy ,emit ekaT .tsrif ta drah leef lliw gnitirw edoc tuB"
"!elpoep rehto morf tnereﬃd on era uoy ,elbuort evah uoy fI .lanoisseforp a ekil leef ot evah t'nod uoY"
".rettam llits yeht ,smargorp llams etirw ylno nac uoy fI .tnemom tcefrep eht rof tiaw t'noD .yadot trats tsuJ"
"Hello, this is future Preston. I hope this message finds you well."
"You are doing great! Sorry about the message scrambling."
"I wonder what else you can do with these arrays?"
"Welp, this is my last message for now."
comments: Function hub to decode the messages below
